00031 /* The APR headers must come after the Passenger headers. See Hooks.cpp
00032  * to learn why.
00033  *
00034  * MessageChannel.h must be included -- even though we don't actually use
00035  * MessageChannel.h in here, it's necessary to make sure that apr_want.h
00036  * doesn't b0rk on 'struct iovec'.
00037  */
00038 #include <apr_pools.h>
00039 #include <httpd.h>
00040 #include <http_config.h>

00048 #ifdef __cplusplus
00049         #include <set>
00050         #include <string>
00051 
00052         namespace Passenger {
00053         
00054                 using namespace std;
00055                 
00056                 /**
00057                  * Per-directory configuration information.
00058                  *
00059                  * Use the getter methods to query information, because those will return
00060                  * the default value if the value is not specified.
00061                  */
00062                 struct DirConfig {
00063                         enum Threeway { ENABLED, DISABLED, UNSET };
00064                         enum SpawnMethod { SM_UNSET, SM_SMART, SM_SMART_LV2, SM_CONSERVATIVE };
00065                         
00066                         Threeway enabled;
00067                         
00068                         std::set<std::string> railsBaseURIs;
00069                         std::set<std::string> rackBaseURIs;
00070                         
00071                         /** Whether to autodetect Rails applications. */
00072                         Threeway autoDetectRails;
00073                         
00074                         /** Whether to autodetect Rack applications. */
00075                         Threeway autoDetectRack;
00076                         
00077                         /** Whether to autodetect WSGI applications. */
00078                         Threeway autoDetectWSGI;
00079                         
00080                         /** Whether mod_rewrite should be allowed for Rails applications. */
00081                         Threeway allowModRewrite;
00082                         
00083                         /** The environment (i.e. value for RAILS_ENV) under which
00084                          * Rails applications should operate. */
00085                         const char *railsEnv;
00086                         
00087                         /** The path to the application's root (for example: RAILS_ROOT
00088                          * for Rails applications, directory containing 'config.ru'
00089                          * for Rack applications). If this value is NULL, the default
00090                          * autodetected path will be used.
00091                          */
00092                         const char *appRoot;
00093                         
00094                         /** The environment (i.e. value for RACK_ENV) under which
00095                          * Rack applications should operate. */
00096                         const char *rackEnv;
00097                         
00098                         /** The Rails spawn method to use. */
00099                         SpawnMethod spawnMethod;
00100                         
00101                         /**
00102                          * The idle timeout, in seconds, of Rails framework spawners.
00103                          * May also be 0 (which indicates that the framework spawner should
00104                          * never idle timeout) or -1 (which means that the value is not specified).
00105                          */
00106                         long frameworkSpawnerTimeout;
00107                         
00108                         /**
00109                          * The idle timeout, in seconds, of Rails application spawners.
00110                          * May also be 0 (which indicates that the application spawner should
00111                          * never idle timeout) or -1 (which means that the value is not specified).
00112                          */
00113                         long appSpawnerTimeout;
00114                         
00115                         /**
00116                          * The maximum number of requests that the spawned application may process
00117                          * before exiting. A value of 0 means unlimited.
00118                          */
00119                         unsigned long maxRequests;
00120                         
00121                         /** Indicates whether the maxRequests option was explicitly specified
00122                          * in the directory configuration. */
00123                         bool maxRequestsSpecified;
00124                         
00125                         /**
00126                          * The maximum amount of memory (in MB) the spawned application may use.
00127                          * A value of 0 means unlimited.
00128                          */
00129                         unsigned long memoryLimit;
00130                         
00131                         /** Indicates whether the memoryLimit option was explicitly specified
00132                          * in the directory configuration. */
00133                         bool memoryLimitSpecified;
00134                         
00135                         Threeway highPerformance;
00136                         
00137                         /** Whether global queuing should be used. */
00138                         Threeway useGlobalQueue;
00139                         
00140                         /**
00141                          * Throttle the number of stat() calls on files like
00142                          * restart.txt to the once per given number of seconds.
00143                          */
00144                         unsigned long statThrottleRate;
00145                         
00146                         /** Indicates whether the statThrottleRate option was
00147                          * explicitly specified in the directory configuration. */
00148                         bool statThrottleRateSpecified;
00149                         
00150                         /** The directory in which Passenger should look for
00151                          * restart.txt. NULL means that the default directory
00152                          * should be used.
00153                          */
00154                         const char *restartDir;
00155                         
00156                         /*************************************/
00157                         
00158                         bool isEnabled() const {
00159                                 return enabled != DISABLED;
00160                         }
00161                         
00162                         string getAppRoot(const char *documentRoot) const {
00163                                 if (appRoot == NULL) {
00164                                         return extractDirName(documentRoot);
00165                                 } else {
00166                                         return appRoot;
00167                                 }
00168                         }
00169                         
00170                         string getAppRoot(const string &documentRoot) const {
00171                                 if (appRoot == NULL) {
00172                                         return extractDirName(documentRoot);
00173                                 } else {
00174                                         return appRoot;
00175                                 }
00176                         }
00177                         
00178                         const char *getRailsEnv() const {
00179                                 if (railsEnv != NULL) {
00180                                         return railsEnv;
00181                                 } else {
00182                                         return "production";
00183                                 }
00184                         }
00185                         
00186                         const char *getRackEnv() const {
00187                                 if (rackEnv != NULL) {
00188                                         return rackEnv;
00189                                 } else {
00190                                         return "production";
00191                                 }
00192                         }
00193                         
00194                         const char *getSpawnMethodString() {
00195                                 switch (spawnMethod) {
00196                                 case SM_SMART:
00197                                         return "smart";
00198                                 case SM_SMART_LV2:
00199                                         return "smart-lv2";
00200                                 case SM_CONSERVATIVE:
00201                                         return "conservative";
00202                                 default:
00203                                         return "smart-lv2";
00204                                 }
00205                         }
00206                         
00207                         unsigned long getMaxRequests() {
00208                                 if (maxRequestsSpecified) {
00209                                         return maxRequests;
00210                                 } else {
00211                                         return 0;
00212                                 }
00213                         }
00214                         
00215                         unsigned long getMemoryLimit() {
00216                                 if (memoryLimitSpecified) {
00217                                         return memoryLimit;
00218                                 } else {
00219                                         return 200;
00220                                 }
00221                         }
00222                         
00223                         bool highPerformanceMode() const {
00224                                 return highPerformance == ENABLED;
00225                         }
00226                         
00227                         bool usingGlobalQueue() const {
00228                                 return useGlobalQueue == ENABLED;
00229                         }
00230                         
00231                         unsigned long getStatThrottleRate() const {
00232                                 if (statThrottleRateSpecified) {
00233                                         return statThrottleRate;
00234                                 } else {
00235                                         return 0;
00236                                 }
00237                         }
00238                         
00239                         const char *getRestartDir() const {
00240                                 if (restartDir != NULL) {
00241                                         return restartDir;
00242                                 } else {
00243                                         return "";
00244                                 }
00245                         }
00246                         
00247                         /*************************************/
00248                 };
00249                 
00250                 /**
00251                  * Server-wide (global, not per-virtual host) configuration information.
00252                  *
00253                  * Use the getter methods to query information, because those will return
00254                  * the default value if the value is not specified.
00255                  */
00256                 struct ServerConfig {
00257                         /** The filename of the Ruby interpreter to use. */
00258                         const char *ruby;
00259                         
00260                         /** The Passenger root folder. */
00261                         const char *root;
00262                         
00263                         /** The log verbosity. */
00264                         unsigned int logLevel;
00265                         
00266                         /** The maximum number of simultaneously alive application
00267                          * instances. */
00268                         unsigned int maxPoolSize;
00269                         
00270                         /** Whether the maxPoolSize option was explicitly specified in
00271                          * this server config. */
00272                         bool maxPoolSizeSpecified;
00273                         
00274                         /** The maximum number of simultaneously alive Rails application
00275                          * that a single Rails application may occupy. */
00276                         unsigned int maxInstancesPerApp;
00277                         
00278                         /** Whether the maxInstancesPerApp option was explicitly specified in
00279                          * this server config. */
00280                         bool maxInstancesPerAppSpecified;
00281                         
00282                         /** The maximum number of seconds that an application may be
00283                          * idle before it gets terminated. */
00284                         unsigned int poolIdleTime;
00285                         
00286                         /** Whether the poolIdleTime option was explicitly specified in
00287                          * this server config. */
00288                         bool poolIdleTimeSpecified;
00289                         
00290                         /** Whether user switching support is enabled. */
00291                         bool userSwitching;
00292                         
00293                         /** Whether the userSwitching option was explicitly specified in
00294                          * this server config. */
00295                         bool userSwitchingSpecified;
00296 
00297                         /** The user that applications must run as if user switching
00298                          * fails or is disabled. NULL means the option is not specified.
00299                          */
00300                         const char *defaultUser;
00301                         
00302                         /** The temp directory that Passenger should use. NULL
00303                          * means unspecified.
00304                          */
00305                         const char *tempDir;
00306                         
00307                         const char *getDefaultUser() const {
00308                                 if (defaultUser != NULL) {
00309                                         return defaultUser;
00310                                 } else {
00311                                         return "nobody";
00312                                 }
00313                         }
00314                         
00315                         const char *getTempDir() const {
00316                                 if (tempDir != NULL) {
00317                                         return tempDir;
00318                                 } else {
00319                                         return getSystemTempDir();
00320                                 }
00321                         }
00322                 };
00323         }

00326 #endif

00328 /** Configuration hook for per-directory configuration structure creation. */
00329 void *passenger_config_create_dir(apr_pool_t *p, char *dirspec);
00330 
00331 /** Configuration hook for per-directory configuration structure merging. */
00332 void *passenger_config_merge_dir(apr_pool_t *p, void *basev, void *addv);
00333 
00334 /** Configuration hook for per-server configuration structure creation. */
00335 void *passenger_config_create_server(apr_pool_t *p, server_rec *s);
00336 
00337 /** Configuration hook for per-server configuration structure merging. */
00338 void *passenger_config_merge_server(apr_pool_t *p, void *basev, void *overridesv);
00339 
00340 void passenger_config_merge_all_servers(apr_pool_t *pool, server_rec *main_server);
00341 
00342 /** Apache module commands array. */
00343 extern const command_rec passenger_commands[];
